name: AMWAL CORP
description: Operator of a debt-based crowdfunding platform intended to let retail investors lend short-term loans to SMEs. The company's platform facilitates investors to invest in small and medium businesses in the form of loans, enabling small businesses and companies to raise funds for growth while allowing investors to earn returns on their investments.
one_liner: Operator of a debt-based crowdfunding platform intended to let retail investors lend short-term loans to SMEs. The company's platform facilitates investors to invest in small and medium businesses in the form of loans, enabling small businesses and companies to raise funds for growth while allowing investors to earn returns on their investments.
